name: ATARI ADVENTURE: Courage Remake
description:
Replay a classic with the Atari Adventure update!

One extra difficulty setting for players who want to challenge themselves!

Improved audio!

Snappy Menu and options menu!

The worst bat you ever did see!

More easter eggs??

Credits-------------------------------------------------------------

This game took me 26 days to complete. All sprites, code, and sounds, were done by me. Font by Codeman38 on Dafont.com. Original game by Warren Robinett

Download instructions--------------------------------------------

Press the download link and unzip the file

Press "Run anyway" when the spooky pop-up comes up

Controls-------------------------------------------------------------

arrow keys to move

space to select or drop items

hold escape to quit back to the menu

Original game-------------------------------------------------------

Check out the original game manual! It might be helpful: https://www.gamesdatabase.org/Media/SYSTEM/Atari_2600/manual/Formated/Adventure_...

Play the original game by Warren Robinett: Play Adventure on Atari 2600 emulator. (warrenrobinett.com)
